name: Mini Sesame Shiba Inu
description:
A fluffy friend from across the Mists.
Combine 2 Sesame and a Red Shiba Inu with 4 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Cream Shiba Inu.
Combine 2 Sesame and a Black and Tan Shiba Inu with 8 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Blue Shiba Inu.
